Original: That is a subjugation request for a
monster that appears on B2F[Color:0] of the
[Color:5]Misty Ravine[Color:0]. Can I rely on you?
[Page]
I want you to subdue a spellcasting
monster that has been seen in the
southern part of B2F's center region.
[Page]
But the monster uses a [Color:5]strange spell[Color:0]
which prevents all who have tried from
approaching, let alone eliminating it.
[Page]
If you find a way to break this spell,
you may have better luck than most.
I shall await your swift return.
Translation: That is a subjugation request for a
monster that appears on B2F[Color:0] of the
[Color:5]Misty Ravine[Color:0]. Can I rely on you?
[Page]
I want you to subdue a spellcasting
monster that has been seen in the
southern part of B2F's center region.
[Page]
But the monster uses a [Color:5]strange spell[Color:0]
which prevents all who have tried from
approaching, let alone eliminating it.
[Page]
If you find a way to break this spell,
you may have better luck than most.
I shall await your swift return.

Original: I heard the details from some of my
other explorer patrons. Excellent
work... your skill is top-notch.
[Page]
I can only imagine the monster's
bafflement to see you running
backwards toward it.
[Page]
But that is the sort of flexible thinking
prized in explorers. Or maybe only in
the [Guild] Guild...
Translation: I heard the details from some of my
other explorer patrons. Excellent
work... your skill is top-notch.
[Page]
I can only imagine the monster's
bafflement to see you running
backwards toward it.
[Page]
But that is the sort of flexible thinking
prized in explorers. Or maybe only in
the [Guild] Guild...

Original: While exploring the misty verdance,
you spot the monster at the path's end
and quickly ready your weapons!
[Page]
At the bar, you were told that the
monster you seek to slay uses some
sort of strange spell...
[Page]
This monster with the sneering glare
must be your target.
[Page]
In order to fulfill the request, you
must challenge the monster while not
running afoul of its spell...
Translation: While exploring the misty verdance,
you spot the monster at the path's end
and quickly ready your weapons!
[Page]
At the bar, you were told that the
monster you seek to slay uses some
sort of strange spell...
[Page]
This monster with the sneering glare
must be your target.
[Page]
In order to fulfill the request, you
must challenge the monster while not
running afoul of its spell...

Original: The monster is still standing before
you...
[Page]
If you would engage the monster in
combat, you must approach it without
looking into its eerily glowing eyes.
Translation: The monster is still standing before
you...
[Page]
If you would engage the monster in
combat, you must approach it without
looking into its eerily glowing eyes.

Original: As you try to charge the monster,
its eyes begin to gleam with an
eerie light.
[Page]
As you stare into those eyes, you
momentarily lose all sense of
direction!
Translation: As you try to charge the monster,
its eyes begin to gleam with an
eerie light.
[Page]
As you stare into those eyes, you
momentarily lose all sense of
direction!

Original: You stare into the eerie light glowing
in the monster's eyes!
Translation: You stare into the eerie light glowing
in the monster's eyes!

Original: When you come to your senses, you
realize that you are nowhere near the
last place you remember being.
[Page]
It seems you were caught up in the
enemy's spell. To fulfill the request,
you must regroup and try again.
Translation: When you come to your senses, you
realize that you are nowhere near the
last place you remember being.
[Page]
It seems you were caught up in the
enemy's spell. To fulfill the request,
you must regroup and try again.

Original: You ready your weapons and prepare
to charge without looking into the
monster's eyes.
Translation: You ready your weapons and prepare
to charge without looking into the
monster's eyes.

Original: After you have confirmed your kill,
you sheathe your weapons and breathe
a sigh of relief.
[Page]
It appears that the method you
improvised to avoid the monster's
eyes was a viable one.
[Page]
The thing will no longer obstruct
anyone's explorations. You should go
and report your success at the bar.
Translation: After you have confirmed your kill,
you sheathe your weapons and breathe
a sigh of relief.
[Page]
It appears that the method you
improvised to avoid the monster's
eyes was a viable one.
[Page]
The thing will no longer obstruct
anyone's explorations. You should go
and report your success at the bar.

Original: After defeating the monster, you
go a ways down the path and notice
a chick with an injured leg.
[Page]
It seems to have fallen out of its
nest. But it shows signs of having
been treated and should recover soon.
[Page]
In the hopes that no predators
approach it, you place the chick
back in its nest.
Translation: After defeating the monster, you
go a ways down the path and notice
a chick with an injured leg.
[Page]
It seems to have fallen out of its
nest. But it shows signs of having
been treated and should recover soon.
[Page]
In the hopes that no predators
approach it, you place the chick
back in its nest.
